actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 93-669.
Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 93-868.

official_title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of additional copies of part I of the Senate hearings entitled "Confidence and Concern: Citizens View American Government--A Survey of Public Attitudes".

summary.text: Provides that there be printed for the use of the Senate Committee on Government Operations 2000 additional copies of Part I of its committee print entitled "Confidence and Concern: Citizens View American Government - A Survey of Public Attitudes," dates December 3, 1973.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of additional copies of part I of the Senate hearings entitled "Confidence and Concern: Citizens View American Government--A Survey of Public Attitudes".
